metadata.dc:author: Garralda Luquin, A
metadata.dc:description: This paper analyses ocular toxicity induced by four groups of systemic medicines: tamoxifen, chloroquine and derivatives, anticholinergics and tamsulosin. Our main aim is to provide some practical rules that will be of use in the everyday management of patients receiving these treatments, rather than to examine the mechanisms by which each of these medicines act.
metadata.dc:title: Toxicidad ocular medicamentosa.
[Ocular toxicity induced by medication].
metadata.dc:publisher: Anales del sistema sanitario de Navarra
